name: Pandemic (John´s Project)
description:
You're the president of a new country, that is now part of the earth (real countries coming soon). In 1/1/2020 a pandemic has started and you have to manage the country in those difficult times.

There are 8 constantly changing statistics that need to be balanced, if they reach a certain value you win or loose.

The statistics can balanced by turning on and off isolation measures like closing country borders, closing schools stopping tourism, forcing mask usage in public places and so on.

Investing budget in vaccine research, health system capacity and bussines aid packages will also help balancing the statistics.
